intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.description: Lowers the opponent's Attack stat by one stage when switching in

regenerator.name: Regenerator
regenerator.description: Restores 1/3 of max HP when switching out

rough_skin.name: Rough Skin
rough_skin.description: Damages the attacker when hit by a contact move

flash_fire.name: Flash Fire
flash_fire.description: Immune to Fire moves and boosts Fire move power by 50%

clear_body.name: Clear Body
clear_body.description: Prevents stat reduction from opponent's moves or abilities

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.description: Ignores Reflect, Light Screen, and Safeguard

cursed_body.name: Cursed Body
cursed_body.description: 30% chance to disable the move that caused damage

merciless.name: Merciless
merciless.description: Always critical hits against poisoned targets

anticipation.name: Anticipation
anticipation.description: Warns if opponent has a super-effective move

pressure.name: Pressure
pressure.description: Opponent's moves cost 2 PP instead of 1

mirror_armor.name: Mirror Armor
mirror_armor.description: Reflects stat-lowering effects back to the attacker

cute_charm.name: Cute Charm
cute_charm.description: 30% chance to infatuate opponent on contact

magic_guard.name: Magic Guard
magic_guard.description: Immune to indirect damage (hazards, status, weather)

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.description: Ignores opponent's stat changes when dealing damage

iron_barbs.name: Iron Barbs
iron_barbs.description: Damages the attacker when hit by a contact move

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.description: Survives one-hit KO moves with 1 HP

weak_armor.name: Weak Armor
weak_armor.description: Lowers Defense by 1, raises Speed by 2 when hit by physical move
